overview: Road movie of the Holy Fire. An almost fabulous journey from the Church of the Holy Sepulchre in Jerusalem to Yakutsk and further along Yakutia - Ust May, Petropavlovsk, Ust Miles, Eldikan, through three rivers, along the harsh Aldan, deep into the taiga and to the Khabarovsk Territory... By planes, ferries, boats, by helicopter, by boat, meeting various wonderful people on his way, Sergey carries the Holy Fire across the country to the temples that he built himself.
title: Fire
